p: Reeborg can determine if there is a wall in front of him, using rien_devant(), or if there is a wall to his right, using right_is_clear(). Write a test that has Reeborg turn left 4 times, so that he ends up back in the same orientation that he started with, but that returns true if there is no wall to his left.

Use the test you have written to have Reeborg get out of worlds Maze 1 Maze 2 by following the left wall. Do the same for solving challenges for worlds Storm 1 and Storm 2, that is, go around the one-room houses in the opposite direction compared with your previous solutions.
